joinUs.pageDescription: Follow these steps to join our student chapter and unlock exclusive benefits.

step1.title: Register with AIChE National
step1.description: First, navigate to the official AIChE student membership page and complete the registration process. This will give you your official membership ID.

step2.title: Fill Out Your Details
step2.description: Carefully fill in all the required personal and academic information on the AIChE registration form.

step3.title: Submit Your Proof of Membership
step3.description: Once you have your membership ID, come back here and submit it along with your details using our chapter's verification form. You can use the button below or scan the QR code with your mobile device.
